wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Maurice Pape (born 22 March 1962) is an English former professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper.

response: Shore attended the New England Conservatory, where he studied composition with Lee Hyla, Malcolm Peyton, and Scott Wheeler. He spent four years as a composer and lyricist in the BMI-Lehman Engel Musical Theatre Workshop and studied opera composition in Denmark with Andy Pape on a Fulbright grant. He received his Ph.D. in composition from the Graduate Center of the City University of New York, studying playwriting with Tina Howe and composition with David Del Tredici. He taught at Baruch College, Emerson College, and Xavier University, and now teaches at The Boston Conservatory at Berklee.
